DOC.brief_summary: Urodynamic Study ( UDS ) represent series agreed-upon clinical test use evaluate functional status lower urinary tract , provide pathophysiological basis urinary symptom . Urodynamic Study involve catheterization lower urinary tract . The prevalence urinary tract infection UDS range 1,5 % 30 % . Studies prophylactic antibiotic UDSs offer data contradictory limited predictive value . Some investigator conclude prophylactic antibiotic valuable others . The objective study evaluate efficacy antibiotic prophylaxis UDS woman , use different antibiotic regimen .
DOC.brief_title: Incidence Symptomatic Asymptomatic Bacteriuria After Urodynamic Study Women
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize , double blind study carry Department Gynecology Sao Paulo Federal University January 2009 December 2012 . The patient randomize four group : Group A receive 500mg levofloxacin , group B receive placebo , group C receive 80mg trimethoprim 400mg sulfamethoxazole ( SMZ-TMP ) group D receive 100mg nitrofurantoin . The tablet administer 30 minute de UDS . All patient instruct collect midstream urine sample microbiology laboratory 14 day UDS . Significant bacteriuria consider > 1.000.000 organisms/mL single specie isolate . All data enter Statistical Package Social Sciences ( SPSS ) 16.0 statistical analysis graphic representation . Likelihood -ratio test Fisher 's exact test use compare prevalence significant bacteriuria UDS different group Student 's t-test ANOVA test use compare continuous variable . To compare group regard BMI variable parity , model analysis variance ( ANOVA ) use , necessary , nonparametric Kruskal-Wallis test compare group relation menopause variable , use Chi-square test . A significance level 0.05 establish statistical analysis .
DOC.criteria: Women 20 85 year old , clinical diagnosis urinary incontinence indication urodynamic study , absence genital prolapse prolapse peak effort exceed hymen , absence urinary tract infection Patients diabetes mellitus , history recurrence urinary tract infection , genital prolapse exceed de hymen , pregnant , kidney stone , allergy antibiotic , use urethral catheter delay
